hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir ibn Abdullah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Friday is divided into twelve hours. Amongst them there is an hour in which a Muslim does not ask Allah for anything but He gives it to him. So seek it in the last hour after the afternoon prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِجَابَةِ أَيَّةُ سَاعَةٍ هِيَ فِي يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Answering Which Hour Is The Hour Of Response On Friday
